author: wjmelements
content:
The Pay Opcode should be SFI as necessary for EOF. It seems I need to present to ACDC. Here are the slides.

https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1pZgbr5yLaSNxpwRdixgkAV9mfo_gql448_iSOVKlyvA/edit

author: jochembrouwer
content: I  think your point that if you want safe ETH transfers in EOF would require a legacy proxy contract in order to do so is a super good point, and this should be added to the motivation of the EIP IMO, because it is a very strong argument/point

author: wjmelements
content:
I previously added:
> The EXTCALL opcode does not provide a way to restrict gas.
